titles.title: Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael (fols. 3ra-105va) I-1) Homily by Timothy (Dumatewos), Patriarch of Alexandria for the 12th of Ḫǝdar (fols. 3ra-8va); commemorative notice (fols. 8va-10va); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 10va-vb); miracle (fols. 10vb-12va) I-2) Homily by an anonymous author [for Taḫśaś] (fols. 12va-17va); commemorative notice (fols. 17vb-18rb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 18rb); miracle (fols. 18rb-19vb) I-3) Homily [by Epiphanius, Metropolitan of Cyprus] for the 12th of Ṭǝrr (fols. 19vb-27va); commemorative notice (fols. 27va-28ra); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 28ra-rb); miracle (fols. 28rb-29rb) I-4) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Yäkkatit (fols. 29rb-32rb); commemorative notice (fol. 32rb-vb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 32vb); miracle (fols. 32vb-34rb) I-5) Homily by [Severus] Patriarch of Antiochia for the 12th of Mäggabit (fols. 34rb-48ra); commemorative notice (fol. 48ra); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 48ra-rb); miracle (fols. 48rb-50ra) I-6) Homily by [Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs] the Orthodox for the 12th of Miyazya (fols. 50ra-54rb); commemorative notice (fol. 54rb-va); miracle (fols. 54va-57rb) I-7) Homily by Yoḥannǝs, [Metropolitan] of Ethiopia for the 12th of Gǝnbot (fols. 57rb-58vb); commemorative notice (fols. 58vb-59rb); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 59rb); miracle (fols. 59rb-61vb) I-8) Homily by [Yoḥannǝs], Metropolitan of ʾAksum [for Säne] (fols. 61vb-67vb); commemorative notice (fols. 67vb-74ra); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 74rb); miracle (fols. 74rb-76vb) I-9) Homily [by Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs] for the 12th of Ḥamle (fols. 76vb-81ra); commemorative notice (fols. 81ra -82va); miracle (fols. 82vb-83rb) I-10) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Näḥase (fols. 83rb-85vb); miracle (fols. 85vb-91rb); commemorative notice (fol. 91rb-va); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 91va) I-11) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Mäskäräm (fols. 91va-95ra); commemorative notice (fol. 95rb-va); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 95va); miracle (fols. 95va-98rb) I-12) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Ṭǝqǝmt (fols. 98rb-103ra); miracle (fols. 103ra-104vb); commemorative notice (fols. 104vb-105va); ʿarke-hymn (fol. 105va)

copyists.copyist: The space for the scribe’s name is left unfilled on fol. 12va.

donors.donor: Several person are mention in supplication formulas, e.g., Wälättä Krǝstos, Wälättä Giyorgis, Wälättä ʿAnanya, Wälättä ʿƎgziʾ (fol. 3a); Gäbrä Śǝllase, Täklä Haymanot, ʿAmätä Mikaʾel (fol. 5va), Wäldä Tǝnsaʾe, Täsfa Śǝllase, Wäldä Krǝstos (fol. 10rb).

txstates.txstate: The front board is broken and repaired. The Ms. was resewn. Many folios are affected by humidity. Holes or tears amended on fols. 20, 23, 45.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (front board repaired). Overback made of reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (3 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(8/fols. 3r-10v) – II(8/fols. 11r-18v) – III(8/fols. 19r-26v) –IV(8/fols. 27r-34v) – V(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 35r-42v) – VI(8/fols. 43r-50v) – VII(8/fols. 51r-58v) – VIII(8/fols. 59r-66v) – IX(8/fols. 67r-74v) – X(8/fols. 75r-82v) – XI(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 6; 7, stub after 1/fols. 83r-90v) – XII(8/fols. 91r-98v) – XIII(8; s.l.: 1, stub after 7; 8, stub before 1/fols. 99r-106v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The handwriting shows sometimes a rather poor quality (see 3r-5v, 75v-77r, 86r-98r).

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist; names of donors; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Text I (alternating with black lines), one or two initial lines in the incipit of sections (homilies) and subsections (miracles and commemorative notices); the first word in the incipit of subsections (hymns), i.e. sälam "salutation".

otherdetails.otherdetail: Texts I-6 and I-9 are not followed by an ʾarke-hymn as all other sections.

extras.extra: - Spaces for rubricated names and incipits of subsections are sometimes left unfilled: e.g., fols. 54va, 75va-82vb; sometimes crudely filled in by a secondary hand (e.g., fols. 17vb, 18rb, 28rb, 76vb, 81ra, 82vb). - Erasures are marked with thin lines: e.g., fols. 4vb, 6va, 7rb, 17vb, 21ra, 23ra, 39ra, 51ra, 53va, 61rb. - Omitted letters and words inserted interlineally: e.g., fols. 5ra, 13vb, 37vb, 42ra, 50va, 53rb, 60rb, 68va, 71rb, 79ra, 93va. - Corrections written over erasures: e.g., fols. 8rb, 14vb, 22vb, 96va. - Immediate corrections are indicated with frames encircling words written erroneously: fols. 9rb, 9vb, 28vb, 38ra, 49vb, 60ra, 64ra, 82vb; in most cases, the scribe erroneously copied a word already written a line before (dittograpy). - Tämälläs-sign, indicating the place where the omitted passage, written in the upper margin belong: fol. 10rb. - Scribbles, writing exercises and crude drawings: fols. 1r-2v, 105vb, 106rb.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Monthly readings are indicated by the names of the months crudely written in the upper margin, in a recent hand, in pen: ሕዳር: fol. 3ra ታሕሣሥ: fol. 12vb ጥር: fol. 19vb የካቲት: fol. 29rb መጋቢት: fol. 34rb ሚያዝያ: fol. 50ra ግንቦት: fol. 57rb ሰኔ: fol. 61vb ሐምሌ: fol. 76vb ነሐሴ: fol. 83rb መስከረም: fol. 91vb ጥቅምት: fol. 98rb.
